name: Active Listening
one_liner: Learn to listen in a way that makes people feel deeply heard.
description: This session helps you build the skill of listening without interrupting, judging, or preparing responses in advance.

sessions.title: Silence & Presence
sessions.goal: Practice holding space without filling it.

name: Genuine Curiosity
one_liner: Learn to ask better questions and spark richer conversations.
description: You’ll practice curiosity-driven dialogue, follow-up questions, and deeper inquiry techniques.

sessions.title: Better Questions
sessions.goal: Ask questions that can't be answered with Yes/No.

sessions.title: Digging Deeper
sessions.goal: Follow up on the answer, not your own thought.

name: Emotional Attunement
one_liner: Sense what someone is feeling and respond with intelligence.
description: You’ll practice identifying emotional cues, tone shifts, and unspoken needs in social interactions.

sessions.title: Matching Energy
sessions.goal: Aligning your response to their state.

name: Social Warmth
one_liner: Learn to radiate warmth, openness, and approachability.
description: Develop conversational tone, micro-expressions, and phrasing that makes people feel at ease.

name: Expressive Communication
one_liner: Speak with more color, imagery, and expressive clarity.
description: You’ll practice vivid language, storytelling fragments, and emotional expression.

sessions.title: Vivid Verbs
sessions.goal: Replace boring words with descriptive ones.

sessions.title: Mini-Stories
sessions.goal: Turn a fact into an anecdote.

name: Asking Great Questions
one_liner: Shift conversations from small talk to meaningful talk.
description: Practice open-ended questions, layered questions, and deepening techniques.

name: Social Confidence
one_liner: Build grounded confidence in any social setting.
description: Explore confidence triggers, create grounding scripts, and simulate social scenarios.

name: Charisma Calibration
one_liner: Learn the ingredients of magnetic presence.
description: Work on cadence, warmth, confidence, downward-inflected tone, and emotional intelligence.

name: Conflict Softening
one_liner: Handle tension gracefully and reduce emotional spikes.
description: Practice de-escalation cues, softening phrases, and perspective-taking exercises.

sessions.title: Agreement Frames
sessions.goal: Find the point of agreement first.

sessions.title: Tone Down
sessions.goal: Lower volume and speed to calm others.

name: Humor Fluency
one_liner: Learn light, playful, naturally funny conversational rhythm.
description: Practice playful exaggeration, timing, observational humor, and gentle teasing.

name: Boundary Communication
one_liner: Say “no” without guilt and “yes” without resentment.
description: Focus on phrasing, timing, tone, and self-protection language.

name: Building Trust
one_liner: Learn how trust is built, lost, and repaired.
description: Explore transparency, consistency, emotional reliability, and micro-trust behaviors.

sessions.title: Reliability
sessions.goal: Do what you say you will.

name: Constructive Feedback
one_liner: Give feedback that strengthens, not damages, relationships.
description: Learn timing, tone, framing, and shared-outcome communication.

sessions.title: Future Focus
sessions.goal: Talk about what to do next time.

name: Receiving Feedback Well
one_liner: Become better at hearing feedback without defensiveness.
description: Practise emotional regulation, curiosity, and the skill of separating self-worth from critique.

sessions.title: Asking for Examples
sessions.goal: Get clarity instead of getting mad.

name: Boundary Detection
one_liner: Sense when someone is uncomfortable and adjust gracefully.
description: Learn to notice verbal and non-verbal cues (AI simulates them verbally).

name: Conversation Flow
one_liner: Keep conversations smooth, dynamic, and engaging.
description: Learn transitions, pivots, topic deepening, spotlight sharing, and conversational pacing.

name: Social Awareness
one_liner: Understand the energy, dynamics, and emotional vibe of a group.
description: Work on reading group signals, avoiding misreads, and adjusting presence to the space.

sessions.title: Scanning the Room
sessions.goal: Notice who is talking and who isn't.

sessions.title: Role recognition
sessions.goal: See the leader, the joker, the observer.

name: Empathic Mirroring
one_liner: Make people feel understood through thoughtful mirroring.
description: Practise emotional language reflection, validating statements, and shared emotional space techniques.

sessions.title: Validating Emotion
sessions.goal: Say 'It makes sense you feel that way'.

name: Assertive Communication
one_liner: Speak clearly, confidently, respectfully — without shrinking or overpowering.
description: Learn assertive phrasing frameworks and practise through scenario simulations.

name: Small Talk → Real Talk Transitioning
one_liner: Seamlessly shift from surface chat to meaningful conversation.
description: Practise transitioning techniques, emotional bidding, and revealing-without-dumping.

sessions.title: The Deep Dive
sessions.goal: Ask about feelings, not just facts.

name: Social Calibration
one_liner: Know when to talk, when to listen, and when to pause.
description: Train timing, interruption avoidance, social spacing, and rhythm matching.

sessions.title: Interrupting Gracefully
sessions.goal: How to jump in without being rude.

name: Non-Defensive Communication
one_liner: Respond calmly even when emotions run high.
description: Practise removing ego, using grounding language, and reframing accusations into dialogue.

sessions.title: Dropping the Shield
sessions.goal: Listen to the content, not the tone.

sessions.title: Curious Response
sessions.goal: Ask 'Say more about that' instead of fighting.

name: Vulnerability Expression
one_liner: Learn to open up without oversharing or under-sharing.
description: Identify safe vulnerability levels, emotional pacing, and relational disclosure.

sessions.title: Checking Reception
sessions.goal: See if they can handle your story.

name: Connection-Building Skills
one_liner: Create warmth, resonance, and emotional closeness with intention.
description: Practise emotional bridges, shared moments, and small relational risks.

name: Social Decision-Making
one_liner: Make wiser choices in social and relational situations.
description: Explore boundaries, responsibility, self-respect, and strategic thinking.

sessions.title: Cost Benefit Analysis
sessions.goal: Is this event worth your energy?

sessions.title: Aligning Values
sessions.goal: Do these people fit your life?

name: Presence & Attunement
one_liner: Show up fully, without distraction or internal noise.
description: Practise grounding, mindful awareness, and emotional presence exercises.

sessions.title: Deep Focus
sessions.goal: Listen as if there is a test later.

name: Conversation Confidence
one_liner: Feel comfortable, natural, and fluid when speaking.
description: Practise confidence scripts, self-regulation, and conversational anchoring techniques.

sessions.title: Recovering from Awkwardness
sessions.goal: Laugh it off and move on.

name: Social Refinement
one_liner: Polish your communication style to be clearer, softer, and more elegant.
description: Practise trimming unnecessary detail, phrasing with precision, and improving conversational elegance.

name: Reading Between the Lines
one_liner: Understand subtext and implicit meanings.
description: Train your ability to infer intent, emotion, and hidden messages through simulation with AI.

name: Conversational Boundaries
one_liner: Respect others’ limits while protecting your own.
description: Practise avoiding over-asking, pressing, or interrogating. Learn gentle boundary reinforcement.

sessions.title: Not Prying
sessions.goal: Accepting 'I don't know' as an answer.
